name: Two Robots
description:
Two Robots

Trapped in a facility and monitored by a mysterious television, two robots must connect to each other in order to proceed.

Unfortunately, they can't move separately. The idiots who programmed them led them to follow the same control scheme; A move from one robot is also applied to the other.

Using the environment, can you help the robots make their way to the end of the facility?

Controls

A and D to move left and right, W to jump.

Credits

Music is "8 Bit Retro Funk" from Fesliyan Studios.

SFX from jsfxr.

Bad pixel art by me.
